body:
So, where do you wanna live when you get older?


I wanna live on the beach in Alabama or somewhere in the Bahamas

replies.body: I've always wanted to see what life is like in America - I figure a nice, quiet but populated place like Seattle would do for me - so I'd probably stay in America for a bit, but overall, I love living in New Zealand. Shootings are practically unheard of, tonnes of nature, littered with beaches and just a safe enviroment.

replies.body:
I'd like to study in Germany. It's ordered and not too flamboyant or plain, which is just what I like in a city (although, I love Big Ben, the Houses of Parliament, London Eye, the Gherkin, the Empire State building, Statue of Liberty, etc.).

I know that Germany is going through economic and social problems at the moment, but I hope those will be sorted by the time I'm able to travel there. I also want to learn more German. =)
replies.body_tagged:

I know that Germany is going through economic and social problems at the moment, but I hope those will be sorted by the time I'm able to travel there. I also want to learn more German. =)
